description: Join Rowan, a retired solicitor, to find out what happens in the Royal Courts of Justice and the Inns of Court - a little world that few Londoners know

events.name: Walking tour with former solicitor, Blue Badge guide

factsheet.heading: Summary
paragraphs: The Royal Courts of Justice are a Gothic revival gem.  ​The nearby Inns of Court are tranquil oases tucked beside the River Thames between the City of London and the City of Westminster.  They lie at the very heart of the English Legal System, but few Londoners other than lawyers ever visit and even most lawyers do not know their history.  They contain some of London’s most beautiful late seventeenth and eighteenth century vernacular architecture, one of London’s oldest churches, and are full of stories.  Get away from the crowds and explore this beautiful corner of historic London!

images.title: Royal Courts of Justice on the Strand

location.address: Royal Courts of Justice, Strand, WC2A 2LL
travel_info: Nearest tube: Holborn, Chancery Lane, Temple
Nearest train: Waterloo, Charing Cross, Blackfriars

name: Legal London
